title: "All In The Family" (w/ Sean Donnelly & Joe DeRosa)
description: Dan & Jay discuss the dynamics between Arnold and all his children. Jay ponders the dating life of his co-host of The SDR Show and Gas Digital Owner, Ralph Sutton. Joe DeRosa has the cops called on him at the airports and the guys go on a google search adventure.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
